DOC.brief_summary: To analyse differences in protein expression in multiple trauma patients for identification of potential biomarkers to predict organ dysfunction.
DOC.brief_title: Proteomics in Multiple Trauma to Identify Organ Failure
DOC.detailed_description: The aim of the present study in humans is to analyse differences in protein expression after multiple trauma in patients for identification of potential biomarkers to predict organ dysfunction.
DOC.criteria: older than 18 years multiple trauma patients ISS >16 children ISS <16
